author: billbarker
msg: Catch all throwables when trying to close the socket.

author: remm
msg: - Add a buffer at the socket layer, configured using the socketBuffer
attribute. Add handling for explicit client flushes.

author: remm
msg: - Refactor byte chunk buffering so that the written data fits inside the limit.
The number of byte copies is similar to what it was before.

author: remm
msg: - Port patch: add filering for control chars in the HTTP header.

author: billbarker
msg: Make certain that we don't return a bad Socket.
